scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server,gen -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run gen:watch"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -n fable,fable-admin,vite -c cyan,magenta,blue "npm run fable:watch" "npm run fable:watch:admin" "vite"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: dotnet fable src/Client/Client.fsproj -o dist/client && vite build
scripts.spike:reflection: dotnet fable ReflectionTest/ReflectionTest.fsproj --outDir dist/spike && node dist/spike/Program.js
scripts.gen: dotnet fable src/Gen/Gen.fsproj --outDir dist/gen && node dist/gen/Program.js
scripts.gen:watch: dotnet fable watch src/Gen/Gen.fsproj --outDir dist/gen --runWatch "node dist/gen/Program.js"
scripts.migrate: dotnet fable src/Gen/Gen.fsproj --outDir dist/gen && node dist/gen/Program.js migrate
scripts.migrate:dry: dotnet fable src/Gen/Gen.fsproj --outDir dist/gen && node dist/gen/Program.js migrate --dry-run
